body:
I have the problem that package A is calling a nested make on package B. The Makefile for B, generated by Cmake, contains
```
# Produce verbose output by default.
VERBOSE = 1

# Command-line flag to silence nested $(MAKE).
$(VERBOSE)MAKESILENT = -s
 
# Suppress display of executed commands.
$(VERBOSE).SILENT:
```
which means that I cannot see the invocation details of the nested make.

Is there a way to include the invocation details and output from the nested make?
title: How to get output of nested make
